definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: The cows were branded with an A in a circle.
sentences.chinese: 那些牛被烙上了加圆圈的A字。

sentences.english: Simply double tap the center circle, and then begin tilting.
sentences.chinese: 只要枪王中心圆圈，然后开始倾斜。

sentences.english: Quake locations and magnitudes are indicated by black circles.
sentences.chinese: 地震的发生地和震级用黑色的圆圈表示。

sentences.english: Poked the middle finger of his other hand through the circle. Poked it in and out. In and out.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他用另一只手的中指往那个圆圈里戳来戳去。

sentences.english: Set the distance to0 so that the shadow is applied evenly around the edge of the circle .
sentences.chinese: 设置影的距离为0，得到一个均匀环绕圆圈边缘的影。

sentences.english: Draw a big blue circle around the small circle.
sentences.chinese: 再围绕小圆圈画一个蓝色的大圆圈。

sentences.english: Draw a big blue circle around the small circle.
sentences.chinese: 再围绕小圆圈画一个蓝色的大圆圈。

sentences.english: Show me the end of a circle.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我圆圈的终点在哪里。

sentences.english: Circles and triangles are relatively easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 圆圈和三角形要相对容易制作。

sentences.english: Slice the red chilli into wafer-thin rounds.
She bent the wire into a circle.
Like this. As much as possible.
sentences.chinese: 像这样，尽可能围成一个圆圈。

sentences.english: In the test a small amount of blood is placed inside a little circle on a piece of plastic.
sentences.chinese: 检验中，少量的血被放进一块塑料上的一个小圆圈里。

sentences.english: The problem areas are, for example, circled in white in the image below.
sentences.chinese: 问题区域如下图所示，已用白色圆圈标出。

sentences.english: Can you swing your arms around and round?
sentences.chinese: 你可会摆动手臂绕成圆圈吗？
